summary: restructuring lists for ease of modding and enjoyment
descriptionHtml:
v1.4 of the main file is out and is standalone, no DLC required.

This resource makes levelled lists efficient, it is now easy to combine levelled lists from different mods so that all your new items appear in-game.
NPC\'s now no longer spawn in specific outfits but instead their items are randomly selected among a lore-friendly list unique to the faction, so for example a bandit might have ragged robes and an iron helmet (only bandits, silver-hand and mercenaries at this time are finished).

[u][b]Installation:[/b][/u]
Drop the master file in your /Skyrim/Data folder and make sure it is selected in the Data Files on the Skyrim launcher and at the bottom of the load order, make sure any compatibility patches you use are below the master file.

Modular patches available for weapons and armour packs, only install what you want and they will appear in game accordingly.  For the items to be included, you MUST have the original mod resources (the meshes/textures).

v1.2 patches and beyond requires Dawnguard and includes loads of fixes, dual wielding and archer bosses, random facial piercings, all silver weapons for silverhand, guards and soldiers use all relevant new weapons, more weapons for the Dawnguard as well as bandages thrown into the mix and recipes/tempering
Rusted versions of BDYEB mod given to draugr/skeletons 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34433]B-D-Y-E-B Shield Mod by TheMalfazar[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35056]Facial Piercings by Regn[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34615]Mantle of the Silver Hand by Hothtrooper44[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29040]The Call of the North[/url] coming soon!

In Weapon Mods Compatibility Patch 1.1:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21120]Heavy Armory - New Weapons by PrivateEye[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8452]LSB BattleHammers by Lord Banewrath Sunblade[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3871]Silver Weapons & Staves from Weapons of the Third Era by 747823[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28146]Rusty Iron Shield for draugres by FuriousFighter[/url]

In Armour Mods Compatibility Patch 1.1:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors Pack by hothtrooper44[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21988]Shields of Skyrim by Delincious[/url]
v1.1 gives a 8% chance for eyepatches to spawn on bandits and guards, rather than the previous helmet replacer
Optional esp gives eyepatches to misc. npc\'s throughout skyrim (skjor, olaf one-eye, delvin, etc.) and will be randomly generated for stormcloaks and imperials

[u]For modders:[/u]

This resource will make adding new weapons to levelled lists much simpler, all you have to do is make the item in Weapons and then drop it in the corresponding list (ex. WeaponSteel1H for 1-handed steel weapons) and they will be included in the levelled list for any that use it, meaning all actors (characters), vendors, chests and rewards.

Introduces branching (eg. Any -> 1H -> Iron ->Sword) rather than big jumbled lists in vanilla.

List legend:
IronSteel means includes only iron and steel weapons and shields
Bandit means weapons up to Elven and iron/steel shields
Standard means weapons and shields up to ebony
Dae means all the way up to Daedric
1H 1-handed
2H 2-handed
DW Dual-wield
1HS 1-handed with shield
Archer sets include a bow, arrows and a dagger
author: mrjentipede
